author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Of gleaming metals touched by sun, their worth still ascends,
As golden hue climbs yet again, on fall of U.S. blends.
In dearth or plenty, rich or poor, their truth remains unspoke,
The ebb and flow of metal's dance, in market's endless cloak.

Young Sullivan sails turbulent tides, in world cloaked by unrest, 
From Afghan plains to Kyiv's snow, he stands the ordeal's test,
Gaza's plight now weighs on his soul, his challenge most severe,
Fate weaves a tale of strife and war, the bard sings with sincere.

Oil ebbs and flows, as the seer's stories foretell,
With Chinese fire waning, a mixed report they sell.
Uncertainties in eagle's lands, of interest's timely cut,
The echoes of commerce, in our world's heart, robust.

feedItems.title: Metals Rise as Gold Continues to Climb After Record Week
feedItems.description: Base metals rose and gold climbed again on a fall in U.S. yields.

feedItems.title: Jake Sullivan Navigates a World of Chaos
feedItems.description: From weighing resigning over Afghanistan, to helping save Kyiv, President Biden’s national security adviser now faces his toughest test over Gaza.

feedItems.title: Oil Mixed on Chinese Demand Concerns, U.S. Rate Cut Uncertainties
feedItems.description: Oil prices hovered in early European trade on concerns over slowing demand in China and uncertainties around the timing of U.S. interest-rate cuts.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Gather ye round and hear mine tale,
Of the dollar, now weak and frail.
'Twill rise or fall, as tides ebb and flow,
On Tuesday's morn, we all shall know.

In Portugal, where the sun doth shine,
Bonds do move in line so fine.
German Bunds and debts of state,
Turn rightward with the hand of fate.

Saudi's oil, a liquid gold,
Their story in high halls is told.
A heavier purse, a lighter keg,
From the dividend, they do not beg.

feedItems.title: Tuesday's U.S. Inflation Data Could Halt Dollar's Decline
feedItems.description: U.S. inflation data on Tuesday could halt the dollar’s recent falls, ING said, as the currency started the week steady after a sharp decline on Friday following the jobs data.

feedItems.title: Portuguese Bonds Move in Line With Bunds After Sunday's Election
feedItems.description: Portuguese government bonds moved in line with German Bunds early Monday after Sunday’s parliamentary election showing the country shifting to the right.

feedItems.title: Saudi Aramco Hikes Dividend, Adjusts Spending
feedItems.description: Saudi Arabia’s national oil company raised its dividend payouts for last year after it achieved its second-highest ever net profit and said investment plans to 2028 would be reduced by an abandoned plan to boost production.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Nikkei, our market mount, in auto tech is steep,
Served cold by Bank of Japan, who riled the sheep.
In stocks it does retreat; for interest rates, we weep,
Like goats on slippery slope, the drop is hard and deep.

Just as the rabbit leaps, in sudden jolt and sway,
So did the CATL shares, on this surprising day.
With Xiaomi, BAIC's play, and Morgan's white array,
Like snail with new-found wings, it chases gloom away.

But alas for Dongfeng, the snail now left behind,
In racing with the hares, no profit could it find.
Its shares slump low in kind, to competition blind,
A dog in crow’s dark nest, a fate most unkind.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Falls 2.2%, Dragged by Tech, Auto Stocks
feedItems.description: Japanese stocks ended lower, dragged by falls in tech and auto stocks, as expectations persisted for the Bank of Japan’s possible shifts away from its ultralow interest-rate policy.

feedItems.title: CATL Shares Rise After JV News, Morgan Stanley Upgrade
feedItems.description: Contemporary Amperex Technology’s shares surged Monday on multiple drivers, including news of a collaboration with Chinese companies Xiaomi and BAIC Motor, as well as an upgrade by Morgan Stanley.

feedItems.title: Dongfeng Motor Shares Slump After Profit Warning
feedItems.description: Dongfeng Motor’s shares slumped after the Chinese automaker said it expects to swing to loss for 2023 amid intensifying competition.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In the market's vast hall, vast gains ascend,
Reaped not from mighty Tech alone, forthright,
But from broader ranks, their strength they lend,
As dawn chasing away the lonesome night.

Revealed by moon, a game of power unfurls,
TikTok, its fate now in the balance broods,
Whether to witness ban or sale, twirls,
In the House's hallowed halls, this dispute intrudes.

Lo, Justice's icy gaze falls upon Boeing's kin,
On sturdy wings aloft, now bemoan a taint,
Alaska's bright bird, caught in turmoil's din,
Thus penned, into this saga, is pained and plaint.

feedItems.title: It Isn't Just Big Tech Propelling Gains in the Stock Market Anymore
feedItems.description: A broader group of companies has fueled the recent climb to records.

feedItems.title: Legislation that would ban TikTok in the U.S. or force its sale is heading toward a vote in the House following months of behind-the-scenes efforts on Capitol Hill.
feedItems.description: Legislation that would ban TikTok in the U.S. or force its sale is heading toward a vote in the House following months of behind-the-scenes efforts on Capitol Hill.

feedItems.title: The Justice Department opened a criminal investigation into the Boeing 737 MAX blowout on an Alaska Airlines flight, according to documents and people familiar with the matter.
feedItems.description: The Justice Department opened a criminal investigation into the Boeing 737 MAX blowout on an Alaska Airlines flight, according to documents and people familiar with the matter.
